title: (x) 'Medeski, Martin & Wood' Alternate Gothic-like sans - Bee {Patricia}
content:
Hi all,

I’m sure you’ll all know this one but I’m clueless - it’s the face used for ’Medeski, Martin & Wood’. That ampersand is superb.

Best,  
Jez
